summary: Completed testing of user registration flow. Backend registration API works correctly (201 status), but frontend form has UI interaction issues preventing complete end-to-end testing.

resolved_issues.evidence: Registration API returns 201 status code and creates user successfully
resolved_issues.test_data: Successfully registered user with email, password, fullName, and accountType

ui_bugs.issue: Form fields have interaction issues - some fields cannot be filled via automation
ui_bugs.selector: Date of birth field (mm/dd/yyyy), SSN field, and terms checkbox
ui_bugs.details: Basic fields (name, email, password, mobile) fill correctly, but complex fields timeout during automation

ui_bugs.issue: Checkbox cannot be clicked due to overlay interception
ui_bugs.details: Overlay elements prevent checkbox interaction, blocking form submission

ui_working_correctly.status: WORKING - Page loads successfully at /signup with proper form layout
WORKING - Name, email, password, and mobile number fields accept input correctly
WORKING - Password strength indicator shows 'Good' and validates requirements
WORKING - Personal Checking account type is pre-selected

csp_violations.issue: Content Security Policy blocking external Creao API calls
csp_violations.impact: External analytics service blocked, but core functionality works

passed_tests: Backend health check responds correctly (200 OK)
User registration API endpoint works (POST /api/auth/register returns 201)
Basic form fields (name, email, password, mobile) accept input
Demo login functionality confirmed working from previous tests

success_percentage.frontend: 60% - Form loads and basic fields work, but complex interactions fail

action_item_for_main_agent: MEDIUM PRIORITY: Fix frontend form interaction issues - specifically the date picker field, SSN field interactions, and terms checkbox overlay problems. The registration API backend is working correctly, but the frontend form needs UI/UX improvements for better accessibility and automation compatibility.
